Detailed Description

Class requesting databuffers from memory and a parent requester.

typedef map<const MC2SimpleString*, storage_t::iterator, MC2SimpleString::StrCmp> MemoryDBufRequester::bufferMap_t [private]
 

Type of map for buffer lookup.

Uses list iterators since they are valid until deleted

)  [private]

virtual void MemoryDBufRequester::release (  const MC2SimpleString &  descr,
BitBuffer *  obj
)  [virtual]
 

Makes it ok for the Requester to delete the BitBuffer or to put it in the cache.

Requesters which use other requesters should hand the objects back to their parents and requesters which are top-requesters should delete them. It is important that the descr is the correct one.

Reimplemented from DBufRequester.

BitBuffer* MemoryDBufRequester::requestCached (  const MC2SimpleString &  descr  )  [virtual]
 

If the DBufRequester already has the map in cache it should return it here or NULL.

The BitBuffer should be returned in release as usual.

Parameters:
descr Key for databuffer.
Returns:
Cached BitBuffer or NULL.

Reimplemented from DBufRequester.

void MemoryDBufRequester::setMaxSize (  uint32  size  ) 
 

Sets maximum storage size.
